page.title: 07SANDY HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: THE HEALTH CENTRE IS IN SANDY TO HELP ANYONE WHO IS ILL. THERE ARE FOUR DOCTORS AT THE CENTRE THREE OF WHOM ARE ON DUTY AT THE SAME TIME. THERE IS ALWAYS ONE DOCTOR ON CALL 24 HOURS A DAY 365 DAYS OF THE YEAR. THEY HAVE AN ANTE-NATAL AND BABY CLINIC, A CHIROPODIST, A DENTIST, FAMILY PLANNING CLINIC, SPEECH THERAPIST, DIETICIAN AND A SCHOOL NURSE. THE CENTRE IS OPEN TWICE A DAY FROM 9am TO 12.30pm AND 2 TO 6pm. THERE ARE 8 THOUSAND PATIENTS ON RECORD COVERING SANDY AND THE SURROUNDING VILLAGES. APART FROM THE HEALTH CENTRE THERE ARE TWO OTHER DOCTORS AND 3 DENTISTS PRACTISING IN SANDY.
